jobDescription: Petits Pains & Co. Wholesale Bakery Focusing on French style breads and breakfast pastries.Now Hiring: DISHWASHERS & SANITATION- Some Nights and Weekends - Full-Time Shifts available - Benefits available for Full-Time Positions Email your cover letter and resume to careers@petitspains.com or stop by our bakery and fill out an application Our address is: 1730 Gilbreth Road Burlingame, CA 94010 Compensation: Starting $12-$13 / Hour Dependent on ExperienceBenefits offered to Full-Time employees: Medical, Dental, Vision, Vacation, etc.
